title: Email suddenly stopped working
content: my email, shepherd@gilanet, stopped coming through at 12 noon. I called the server, gilanet.com and he had me delete the shepherd@gilanet.com account and then readd it. It won't let me add the account. It says it can't find the server. They put in a trouble ticket but don't know when they will get back to me.. Any help would be appreciated
creator: shepherdsbunker
